game.name: Train Simulator: Linz - Passau Route Add-On
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Embark on more services throughout Austria, through towns, countryside, and right to the German border with another expansive stretch from RSSLO for Train Simulator Classic!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on more services throughout Austria, through towns, countryside, and right to the German border with another expansive stretch from RSSLO for Train Simulator Classic!
